summary: Build a public, India-wide online store app for the food/masala brand "Jubaan Hit Masala", with product categories, ordering, and payments.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Brand logo with a bold, traditional Indian spice aesthetic (jubaan-hit-masala-logo.dim_512x512.png)
- Homepage hero banner with spices/masala imagery and warm tones (jubaan-hit-masala-hero.dim_1600x600.png)

existing_features.title: Create a public storefront for the brand name "Jubaan Hit Masala" with a homepage that highlights the brand, featured products, and key actions (Browse Products, View Cart, Track Order). All user-facing text must be in English.
Implement product catalog browsing with categories for food/masala items, including category listing, product listing, and product detail pages showing name, price, description, and optional image.
Add cart and checkout flow: users can add/remove items, adjust quantities, see order totals, and place an order with customer details (name, phone, delivery address, city, state, PIN code).

Implement a payment selection and order payment status model that supports at least: Cash on Delivery and Manual UPI payment (user submits a payment reference/UTR). Include a clear admin-only method (backend) to mark an order as Paid/Confirmed without relying on third-party payment processors.
Add order lookup/tracking for customers using an order id and phone number to view order status, payment status, and items summary (no real-time updates required).
Provide a minimal admin interface protected by Internet Identity login to manage catalog and orders: create/edit categories and products, view orders list, and update order status/payment status.
Define a coherent visual theme for the "Jubaan Hit Masala" brand UI (colors, typography, spacing, components) and apply it consistently across pages. Do not use a blue/purple primary palette.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create a public e-commerce app for the "Jubaan Hit Masala" brand featuring food/masala categories, online ordering, and payment support for customers across India.
Seed the app with initial demo data for an India-wide masala/food store (several categories and several products per category) so the storefront is usable immediately after deployment.
